name: World of Afanor - Escape from Wizard's Dungeon
name_original: World of Afanor - Escape from Wizard's Dungeon
description: This is the first in a series of RPGs based on the new World of Afanor, on this short horror game you control a slave trying to escape a dungeon prison, it's a ruthless game of survival, so use every weapon and potion wisely!
